QuestData.Title: Mind Control
QuestData.Description: Mind Vision is not enough, no.$b$bMind Control, much more powerful magic, yes.$b$bPowerful magic needs powerful reagents, and troll brain is a powerful reagent.$b$bBraddok in Zul'Mamwe, very smart, yes.$b$bHead south, and check out the big brain on Braddok.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Braddok's Big Brain from Braddok in Zul'Mamwe.
QuestData.CompletionText: Extra-big spells need extra-big brains, yes.
QuestData.RewardText: Hold on, next part is tough, yes.$b$bLots of chances to fail, yes.$b$bBut $n and $n'aka going to be reunited... yes they will.
